The Rhode Island Senate is the upper house of the Rhode Island General 
Assembly, the state legislature of the US state of Rhode Island. It is composed of 
38 Senators, each of whom is elected to a two-year term. Rhode Island is one of 
the 14 states where its upper house serves at a ... There is no limit to the number 
of terms that a Senator may serve.
